channel.title: [PI][317][REQ] Voters Chest
channel.description: Hello I wanted to know how I can add a voters chest, sorta like a crystal key chest but with a different key. I want the voters to get points out of the chest instead of items. Can anyone help me? Please & Thankyou!

item.title: [PI][317][REQ] Voters Chest
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

		case ####:
			int toAdd = Misc.random(2);
			if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(989)) {
				c.getItems().removeItem(989, 1);
				c.startAnimation(881);
				if(toAdd == 0){
					c.slayerPoints += 15;
					c.sendMessage("You reach your hand in the chest and receive 15 slayer points!");
				}else if(toAdd == 1){
					c.loyaltyPoints += 10;
					c.sendMessage("You reach your hand in the chest and receive 10 loyalty points!");
				}else if(toAdd == 1){
					c.bossPoints += 5;
					c.sendMessage("You reach your hand in the chest and receive 5 boss points!");
				}
			} else {
				c.sendMessage("The chest is locked, it won't budge!");
				return;
			}
			break;

That goes in firstclickobject within your action handler.
Change the points and send messages accordingly, if you want more points change
Misc.random(2); to something higher.
Don’t forget to add a real case number.

This may(not) work. I just wrote it fast and sloppily.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI][317][REQ] Voters Chest
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:8, topic:527264”][quote author=gothopunk87 link=topic=646011.msg4344507#msg4344507 date=1375673215]
I should of specified, NOT THE VOTING POINTS. I HAVE LOYALTY POINTS, BOSS POINTS ETC. That I want players to be able to get out of the chest but all completely random.
[/quote]
Okay, so add the chest and everything like normal, but instead of having an array of items it picks from, use an array of strings.
The strings would be the variable names for the points you’re using.
Then when it calls the randomization and the reward, replace the code to give an item with the name of the String array you used… And so on.[/quote]

i think he wants you to put a block of code here, don’t do it though that way he will never learn
it’s better for him to look it up on google that way he will learn what an array is

why aren’t you server helper by the way? you’re like the only one here who takes scrubs serious, which is a nice thing, i do not have that patience. Just saying.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI][317][REQ] Voters Chest
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

gothopunk87:

I should of specified, NOT THE VOTING POINTS. I HAVE LOYALTY POINTS, BOSS POINTS ETC. That I want players to be able to get out of the chest but all completely random.

Okay, so add the chest and everything like normal, but instead of having an array of items it picks from, use an array of strings.
The strings would be the variable names for the points you’re using.
Then when it calls the randomization and the reward, replace the code to give an item with the name of the String array you used… And so on.
